author: randomishwalk
content: how is this functionally different I guess from a very similar type of activity where instead of empty blocks, someone just loaded a block with a ton of transfers back and forth between controlled wallets whilst bidding up gwei?

author: randomishwalk
content: I think as long as this type of activity has an explicit *cost* attached to it and it is priced effectively in fee markets, I don't see how this is a LT issue?
